title: Does Bobby Plan On A Wedding Day 'First Look'? + John Morgan Of 'Morgan & Morgan' Answers Legal Questions + Tenille Arts Talks About Her First Ever #1 Hit!
itunes:title: Does Bobby Plan On A Wedding Day 'First Look'? + John Morgan Of 'Morgan & Morgan' Answers Legal Questions + Tenille Arts Talks About Her First Ever #1 Hit!
description:
Bobby has been getting the question a lot of if he’s doing a first look at his wedding…and why he thinks he may cry. We talked to John Morgan of Morgan & Morgan law firm to settle a problem we had submitted to us in a mailbag about last names. He also answers our legal questions in regard to name changes, liability and whose at fault things getting broken at your kid’s school. We talked to Tenille Arts about her first no. 1 and the crazy journey it had to land at the top of the chart.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
